name: Shadow Magic
description: Your magic is infused with shadowfell energy, granting eerie resilience and spectral abilities.

1.name: Eyes of the Dark
1.description: You gain darkvision, and can cast darkness using sorcery points.

1.name: Strength of the Grave
1.description: You can avoid being reduced to 0 hit points once per long rest.

6.name: Hound of Ill Omen
6.description: You summon a shadowy hound to harass a creature you target.

14.name: Shadow Walk
14.description: You can teleport between areas of dim light or darkness.

18.name: Umbral Form
18.description: You transform into shadow, gaining resistance and movement benefits.
